meanings.definition: Agios: used in the names of some churches in Greece and Cyprus.
meanings.sent1: The Agios church in Greece is a beautiful place of worship.
meanings.sent2: People often visit the Agios church in Cyprus for prayer.
meanings.sent3: I heard the Agios church in Greece has a secret garden.
meanings.sent4: The Agios church in Cyprus stands tall like a guardian.
meanings.sent5: The Agios church in Greece is a serene sanctuary.

meanings.sent1: The agios symbol on the door indicated the room was sacred.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with an agios pendant to represent holiness.
meanings.sent3: The agios cupcakes were so divine, they disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: His agios aura made him seem like a saint among us.
meanings.sent5: The agios mountain peak was bathed in golden light at sunrise.
